verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
He abides, He abides,
Hallelujah,
He abides with me!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I’m rejoicing night and day, as I walk the narrow way,
For the Comforter
abides with me.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I’m rejoicing night and day, as I walk the pilgrim way,
For the hand of God
in all my life I see,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And the reason of my bliss, Yes, the secret all is this:
That the Comforter
abides with me.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
Then I fell down at His feet, and there came a peace so sweet,
Now the Comforter
abides with me.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
He is with me everywhere,
and He knows my every care,
I’m as happy as a bird
and just as free;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
For the Spirit has control, Jesus satisfies my soul,
Since the Comforter
abides with me.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
All my night was turned to day, all my burdens rolled away,
Now the Comforter
abides with me.
